Package pr4.vehicles

Interface IVehicleRace

All Superinterfaces:
IVehicle
All Known Implementing Classes:
Car, Motorcycle, Truck, Vehicle
public interface IVehicleRace
extends IVehicle
IVehicleRace interface, extends the one provided by the professors and is used by the race (it keeps a list of IVehicleRace)
Author:
Pablo Cuesta (pablo.cuestas@estudiante.uam.es), Diego Cid (diego.cid@estudiante.uam.es)

  • Method Details

    • move

      void move()
      Move the vehicle to a new position (one single turn)

    • distance

      double distance​(IVehicle w)
      The distance between this and vehicle w.
      Parameters:
      w - the vehicle to calculate the distance to.
      Returns:
      The distance between this and vehicle w. Greater than 0 if w is ahead.

    • canAttack

      boolean canAttack()
      If this can attack
      Returns:
      true iff this can attack (if it has a non-damaged dispenser)

      This vehicle attacks w
      Parameters:
      w - attacked vehicle
